content: With high-precision performances from both players, the eleventh match of the FIDE World Chess Championship 2023 ended in a draw. Now (April 24): Nepo 6, Ding Liren 5. Three more draws will be enough for the Russian to reach the tally (7.5) which will give him the title of World Champion.
translations: ita:Con prestazioni di alta precisione di entrambi i giocatori, l'undicesima partita del FIDE World Chess Championship 2023
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
